Luis Sevillano
Some of my data visualization/ infographics work

Static maps

Mar 20, 2016

Each day at the newsroom I have to deal with new opportunities to learn and improve bit by bit. During the last year I had to make different maps, usually I use QGIS for georeferencial issues, landsat imagery, and the base map. Then I use Illustrator to style and personalize it.

QGIS Illustrator Photoshop Landsat ai2html
